feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and commas for punctuation, indicating a similar style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a mix of technical and descriptive language, suggesting a similarity in lexical and grammatical features.

feature3.explanation: Both texts contain complex sentence structures and quantitative features, showing a shared level of coherence.

feature4.explanation: While the topics differ, both texts share a serious and informative tone, indicating a commonality in text and discourse features.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text, suggesting a similar level of attention to detail.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure and coherence, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the overall confidence in the texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
